@template public
{{div: class=white}}
{{div: class=container why-page}}

@col12


{{html:
<div ng-controller="SessionController">
<div ng-controller="ResetPasswordController" ng-cloak>

<h1 ng-model="username">Reset password <span ng-show="username">for {[username ]}</span></h1>
    <div ng-show="verificationStatus=='PENDING'">
}}

Verifying...

{{html:
    </div>
    <div class="alert" ng-show="verificationStatus=='EXPIRED'">

}}
Your link is invalid or expired, you have to [request a new one| ForgotPassword].

{{html:
    </div>
    <div ng-show="verificationStatus=='VALIDTOKEN'">

    <form name="form" ng-submit="updatePassword()">
        <br/>
      <div class="tab-pane row" style="margin-bottom: 40px; margin-left: 15px;">
        <div class="nameField" style="margin-bottom: 10px; width: 100%;">
           <label class="left control-group" style="margin: 0 10px 0 0; width: 150px; height: 30px; line-height: 30px; font-size: 14px;">New password:</label>
          <input required ng-model="newPassword" type="password" name="password" id="password" class="input-xxlarge" style="width: 20%; float: left; margin-right: 10px;">
        </div>
        <div class="nameField" style="margin-bottom: 10px; width: 100%;">
           <label class="left control-group" style="margin: 0 10px 0 0; width: 150px; height: 30px; line-height: 30px; font-size: 14px;">Retype password:</label>
          <input required ng-model="retypePassword" type="password" class="input-xxlarge" style="width: 20%; float: left;">
        </div>
      </div>
        <button type="submit" class="btn btn-info btn-large">Update Password</button>
        <div class="txt-center">
          <div class="alert" ng-class="{'alert-success': alertStatus=='success', 'alert-danger': alertStatus=='error'}" ng-show="updateResultMessage" style="margin-top: 20px !important; width: 40%; text-align: center;">{[ updateResultMessage ]}</div>
        </div>
      </form>

    </div>
    <div ng-show="verificationStatus=='SUCCEEDED'">
    Your password has been successfully updated.
    </div>
    <div class="alert alert-error" ng-show="verificationStatus=='ERROR'">
}}
An unexpected error occurred while processing your request.

</div>
</div>

<script src="/$$space/.files/js/controllers/ResetPasswordController.js" type="text/javascript"></script>

}}
